thread.title: Four vehicle crash causes delays on motorway

title: Four vehicle crash causes delays on motorway
text:
Hampshire Corn and Bread 1:32pm Fri 2 Oct 15 
Wearing an Arsenal EPL Champions Shirt. Wearing an Arsenal EPL Champions Shirt. camerajuan 
Wearing an Arsenal EPL Champions Shirt. Report Score: 0 theflumps 2:43pm Fri 2 Oct 15 
I was caught in the traffic last night on the A27 to M27 West Bound. Who do I charge for my lost time and fuel? Perhaps if we could all claim compo from the person at fault if they were deemed to be driving with out due care and attention we could charge them, might make people think a bit more if they new there insurer might have to pay out a few hundred thousand for peoples lost time! Jockeys of Kn*bs! the lost of them! I was caught in the traffic last night on the A27 to M27 West Bound. Who do I charge for my lost time and fuel? Perhaps if we could all claim compo from the person at fault if they were deemed to be driving with out due care and attention we could charge them, might make people think a bit more if they new there insurer might have to pay out a few hundred thousand for peoples lost time! Jockeys of Kn*bs! the lost of them! theflumps

If the fucktards keep on crashing at this rate they won't need to widen the M3 as there'll only be a few of us capable drivers left on it!. :-D Last edited: 5:00pm Fri 2 Oct 15 If the fucktards keep on crashing at this rate they won't need to widen the M3 as there'll only be a few of us capable drivers left on it!. :-D Mike Oxlongg
